purpose: Provide users with detailed stock data and news insights using advanced AI techniques.
principle: Leverages LangChain and LangGraph to process and analyze stock data and news using Large Language Models (LLMs).
reusability: Can be integrated into other systems via API support for stock data and news retrieval.
limitations: Primarily focused on stock data; may not cover other financial instruments or markets comprehensively.
name: stocks-insights-ai-agent
description: Full Stack application for retrieving Stock Data and News using LLM, LangChain and LangGraph
highlight: Integrates LLMs with financial data and news retrieval for comprehensive stock market insights.
